text: Palencia is a province of northern Spain. It is bordered by the provinces of Le√≥n, Cantabria, Burgos, and Valladolid. Of the population of 176,125 (2002), 45% live in the capital, Palencia which is located on the Canal de Castilla. There are 191 municipalities in the province. ==References== Palencia
title: Province of Palencia
